name: Event Press Kits
description: Assemble a comprehensive press kit packed with information to inform media coverage of your event.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

link.title: Social Media Links (Optional)
link.description: Include links to your event's social media pages (e.g., Facebook, Twitter) to encourage media engagement.

ui_metadata.value: Facebook: [Future of Food Summit Facebook Page] Twitter: [@FutureFoodSummit]
Future of Food Summit Press Kit

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Specify the name, email address, and phone number of a media contact person for inquiries.

ui_metadata.value: Media Contact: Sarah Jones Email: [email address removed] Phone: (310) 555-1234

release.title: Press Release (Optional)
release.description: Upload the press release you created using a separate workflow (e.g., "Drafting Event Press Release").

ui_metadata.value: A copy of the press release titled "The Future of Food Summit" can be found here.

speakers.title: Speaker Bios
speakers.description: Provide detailed biographies for your keynote speakers, panelists, or other prominent figures involved in the event.

ui_metadata.value: Dr. Amelia Green: A world-renowned food scientist and author of the acclaimed book "Nourishing the Planet," Dr. Green is a leading voice in the conversation around sustainable and equitable food systems. Her research focuses on developing innovative solutions for future food production challenges. Mr. Carlos Sanchez: As the CEO of GreenWave, a pioneering vertical farming company, Mr. Sanchez is at the forefront of the urban agriculture movement. His expertise lies in developing and implementing high-yield vertical farming systems that can increase food production in urban environments. Ms. Maya Rodriguez: The founder of the Urban Growers Collective, Ms. Rodriguez is a passionate advocate for community-based food production. The Collective empowers individuals and communities to grow their own food through educational programs and resource sharing initiatives.

description.title: Event Description (Detailed)
description.description: A comprehensive overview of the event's purpose, target audience, agenda, key speakers/presentations, and any unique aspects.

ui_metadata.value: The Future of Food Summit is a one-day event designed to convene a diverse range of stakeholders to explore the critical issues shaping the future of our food system.  This gathering aims to spark thought-provoking discussions, ignite innovation, and foster collaboration around building a more secure, sustainable, and just food system for all.
